page.title: 08SAND AND GRAVEL EXTRACTION
page.content: Near Mucking is the largest working sand and gravel quarry in S.E.Essex. It is owned by Cory Sand and Ballast Co. and covers over 1,000 acres. Materials from this site have been widely used in the construction industry eg. M 25, A 13 and house building.The old workings have either been conserved or are being restored. The Warren consists of 3 waterfilled pits which are relics of former workings.Shell U.K. maintains the two largest as a recreational amenity for its refinery workers.Fishing is very popular at this site. Around Mucking Creek, nearby, is a Nature Reserve, run by the Essex Naturalist Trust, where rare birds can be seen. At the jetty on Mucking Flats, refuse from London arrives in sealed containers to be used for landfill.
